title: Highly Skilled Frontend Engineer with a Passion for Accessibility and Open Source
description: I had the pleasure of getting on a Livestream with Tobiloba and was thoroughly impressed with his skills. His proficiency in JavaScript and TypeScript is evident in his high-quality code. He also demonstrates a solid commitment to accessibility and open source, constantly striving to make any project more inclusive and open to contributions. I highly recommend Tobiloba for any front-end development role and look forward to working with him.
